title: FS/FT: Lot of 8 Lower Grade T210 Old Mill Series 1 - All Low Population *PRICE DROP*
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Lot of 8 Lower Grade T210 Old Mill Series 1 - All Low Population *PRICE DROP*
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T210 Old Mill cards for sale. These are all obviously lower grade cards as the scans will show, but are all low population cards with fewer than 10 total graded combined PSA/SGC.  I'd love to trade as well for any T210s that I need (any series.)

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

Cards Pictured:  **ALL SOLD**

Huber (Jacksonville) - $45 **SOLD**
Ison (Macon) - $30 **SOLD**
Kalkhoff (Macon - SGC 45) - $75 **SOLD**
Krebs (Columbus) -$35 **SOLD**
Lewis (Columbus) -$45 **SOLD**
Martina (Savannah) - $65 **SOLD**
Mulldowney (Columbia) - $12 **SOLD**
Wagner (Augusta) -$18 **SOLD**
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  I'd also love to trade these for other T210s that I need!
